Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan ka xšnūman nē srōš bēd ān ī bēd guftan ka ahlawān bēd auuaŋhā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō bē guftan

"They should recite twice aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaōϑrąm ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. When the šnūman is not for Srōš, they shoud recite the corresponding one. If it is for the ahlawān, they should recite auuaŋhā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō."
